LABEL: NARS 3-level reporting region (2015), based on aggregating AGGR_ECO9_2015 reporting regions: EHIGH=Eastern Highlands (NAP, SAP); PLNLOW=Plains and Lowlands (CPL, NPL, SPL, TPL, UMW); WMTNS=Western Mountains and Xeric (WMT, XER).

NARS 9-level reporting region (2015), based on aggregated Omernik Level III ecoregions: CPL=Coastal Plains; NAP=Northern Appalachians; NPL=Northern Plains; SAP=Southern Appalachians; SPL=Southern Plains; TPL=Temperate Plains; UMW=Upper Midwest; WMT=Western Mountains; XER=Xeric West.
